iati-activity.title: Strengthening Transparency, Accountability and Responsiveness in Ghana (STAR-Ghana)
iati-activity.description: STAR-Ghana is a multi- donor pooled funding mechanism (Funded by DFID, DANIDA, EU and USAID) to increase the influence of civil society and Parliament in the governance of public goods and service delivery, with the ultimate goal of improving the accountability and responsiveness of Ghanaâ€™s government, traditional authorities and the private sector.
iati-activity.sector: To increase the influence of civil society and Parliament in the governance of public goods and service delivery.
